overview:
Greg Keim is the head of Rosetta Stone’s technology labs and is responsible for innovation across all products.

Greg graduated from Swarthmore College in 1992, with a double major in mathematics and computer science. He joined Rosetta Stone in early 1992 spearheading technical design and development leading to the first award-winning Rosetta Stone release.

In fall of 1994, Greg resumed his education at Duke University, where he entered a Ph.D. program in computer science and focused studies on artificial intelligence, natural language processing and voice dialog systems. In 1999, Greg returned to Rosetta Stone, becoming the companyâ€™s chief technical officer.
